sentence.Network_en: An enemy battery zeroed in on the crossroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 敌人炮兵集中炮火于那个十字路口.

sentence.Network_en: Just follow your nose until you reach the first crossroad, and then turn right.
sentence.Network_cn: 照直走,走到第一个交叉路口右转.

sentence.Network_en: Go down this street, turn left at the fourth crossroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 沿着这条街走, 在第四个十字路口向左拐.

means.word_mean: 1. a junction where one street or road crosses another

auth_sentence.content: It imagines us approaching a West Texas crossroad in a spirit of unfettered spontaneity.
auth_sentence.res_content: It imagines us approaching a West Texas crossroad in a spirit of unfettered spontaneity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It imagines us approaching a West Texas crossroad in a spirit of unfettered spontaneity.

auth_sentence.content: This was a countryside of corn and soybeans, of grain-fed-catfish ponds, of feed stores and Kingdom Halls in crossroad towns.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was a countryside of corn and soybeans, of grain-fed-catfish ponds, of feed stores and Kingdom Halls in crossroad towns.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was a countryside of corn and soybeans, of grain-fed-catfish ponds, of feed stores and Kingdom Halls in crossroad towns.

auth_sentence.content: History has led us to a new crossroad, with new promise and new peril.
auth_sentence.res_content: History has led us to a new crossroad, with new promise and new peril.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: History has led us to a new crossroad, with new promise and new peril.

jushi.english: Our army stole a march on the enemy and reached the crossroads an hour ahead of them.
jushi.chinese: 我军偷偷地抢在敌军前面行动,比他们早一小时到达十字路口。

jushi.english: We have come to a crossroads in our lives.
jushi.chinese: 我们已经到了人生的转折点。

jushi.english: When we came to the crossroads, I saw his car.
jushi.chinese: 我们来到十字路口时，我看到了他的车。
